{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[8 January|8]]''' -  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 319]].
* '''[[18 January|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 319a]].
* '''[[25 January|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 320]].
==February==
* '''[[4 February|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 321]].
* '''[[12 February|12]]''' - Actor [[Scott Menville]] is born.
* '''[[13 February|13]]''' - [[Rachel Tolkien]] is born.
* '''[[22 February|22]]''' - Producer [[Callum Greene]] is born.
* '''[[25 February|25]]''' - Actor [[Sean Astin]] is born.
==March==
* '''[[5 March|5]]''' - Actor [[Yuri Lowenthal]] is born.
* '''[[18 March|18]]''' - Tolkien writes [[letter 322]].
==April==
* '''[[7 April|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Randy Trimmer|a letter to Randy Trimmer]].
==May==
* '''[[19 May|19]]''' - Actor [[Grant George]] is born.
* '''[[26 May|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Dorothy Wood (26 May 1971)|a letter to Dorothy Wood]].
==June==
* '''[[2 June|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] begins writing [[letter 323]].
* '''[[4 June|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] begins writing [[letter 324]].
* '''[[10 June|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 322a|a letter to "My dear Ladies"]].
* '''[[21 June|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Brian Miller|a letter to Brian Miller]].
==July==
* '''[[17 July|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 325]].
* '''[[18 July|18]]''' - Actress [[Sarah McLeod]] is born.
* '''[[24 July|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 326]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Shadows of Heaven|Shadows of Heaven: Religion and Fantasy in the Fiction of C.S. Lewis, Charles Williams and J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
==August==
* '''[[17 August|17]]''' - Linguist [[Helge Fauskanger]] is born.
* '''[[22 August|22]]''' - Actor [[Richard Armitage]] is born.
* '''[[25 August|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 327]].

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - Actor [[Dave Wittenberg]] is born.
* '''[[3 September|3]]-[[6 September|6]]''' - [[Mythcon 2]].
==October==
* '''[[28 October|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Joy Hill (28 October 1971)|a letter to Joy Hill]].
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 329]], a draft only.
==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 330]].
* '''[[8 November|8]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 330a]].
* '''[[16 November|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Fay Darrington (16 November 1971)|a letter to Miss Fay Darrington]].
* '''[[29 November|29]]''' - [[Edith Tolkien]] dies after a short but severe illness attributed to an inflamed gall-bladder.
* '''[[29 November|29]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 331]].
==December==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 331a]].
* '''[[11 December|11]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to George and Moira Sayer (11 December 1971)|a letter to George and Moira Sayer]].
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 331b]].
* '''[[20 December|20]]''' - Actor [[Michael Yurchak]] is born.
* '''[[24 December|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Eileen Elgar (24 December 1971)|a letter to Eileen Elgar]].
* '''[[25 December|25]]''' - ''[[Attacks of Taste]]'', with a contribution by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Joy Hill (26 December 1971)|a letter to Joy Hill]].
* '''[[28 December|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to W.B. Crouch|a letter to W.B. Crouch of the Southern Cigar, Co.]].
==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien and The Silmarillion]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a letter to his brother (the [[Letter to Hilary Tolkien]] letter).
* '''?''' - In Autumn, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 328]].
